original_text: I will watch them carefully and I will take care of them. I will bring them back to this land. I will build them up and make them strong. I will not knock them down. I will help them to grow in the land, like plants with good roots. I will not pull them up.
korean_text: 내가 그들을 돌아보아 좋게 하여 다시 이 땅으로 인도하여 세우고 헐지 아니하며 심고 뽑지 아니하겠고

sentences.original_text: and I will take care of them
I will bring them back to this land
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들을 이 땅으로 돌아오게 하겠다

sentences.original_text: I will not knock them down
I will help them to grow in the land
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들이 그 땅에서 자라도록 돕겠다

sentences.original_text: I will not pull them up
